title: Behavior Change Project for Enhancing Health Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Most learners primarily use smartphones as their main learning tool, requiring practical motivation for improving health behaviors

learning_goals: After 8 weeks, learners can identify three or more reliable health information sources by applying health information evaluation criteria.
By week 12, learners can set personal health goals (nutrition/exercise/sleep), analyze 4 weeks of practice records, and write a behavior change report.
In the final evaluation, learners can apply three or more cognitive psychology principles to proposed health campaign plans through peer assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
